ComicInfo.Summary:
The thrilling conclusion to the critically acclaimed series sees two become the sign of the one… Rasputin, the mad Russian monk, has forced either Holmes or Houdini to take their final bow, leading our remaining adventurer to rally his spirits to combat the man who cannot be killed.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Aaron Campbell | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Colton Worley | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-10 11:26:32. [CVDB486739]
ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder, Joseph Rybandt, Molly Mahan
ComicInfo.Characters: Grigori Rasputin, Harry Houdini, Sherlock Holmes
